title: Tesla Stock Has Risen This Month as Its Third-Quarter Numbers Approach
text:
It’s difficult to imagine a time when the conversation around shares of Tesla will be entirely drama-free. But an analyst noted earlier this month that things seemed “low-controversy” lately, and the electric auto maker’s shares are up 9% in September.

That should perhaps be taken with a grain of salt. Tesla stock (TSLA), which finished Friday down 0.3% to $245.20, is still down 27% for the year. The shares remain closer to the prices below $180 they touched in June than the roughly $333 at which they finished 2018.

...
description: It’s difficult to imagine a time when the conversation around shares of Tesla will be entirely drama-free. But that’s a fair description of September so far.
